mapper.select: SELECT f.control_no,f.msr_code,f.owner,f.location,f.info,c.code_nm item_code,f.reg_dt FROM fcltmng f,codes c WHERE control_no = #{control_no} AND f.item_code = c.code_no

SELECT c.msr_no, p.msr_nm msr_code, c.msr_reg_dt, c.msr_temp , c.msr_humid, c.msr_bright FROM msrrec c, msrequip p WHERE MSR_REG_DT = (SELECT max(msr_reg_dt) KEEP(DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY msr_reg_dt DESC) msr_reg_dt FROM msrrec WHERE msr_code = #{msr_code}) AND c.msr_code = p.msr_code

SELECT ROUND(AVG(NVL(MSR_TEMP, 0)),0) MSR_TEMP, ROUND(AVG(NVL(MSR_HUMID, 0)),0) MSR_HUMID, ROUND(AVG(NVL(MSR_BRIGHT, 0)),0) MSR_BRIGHT FROM msrrec WHERE msr_reg_dt < sysdate-${msr_no} AND msr_reg_dt >= sysdate-${msr_no}-1 AND MSR_CODE = #{msr_code}
SELECT msr_code,msr_nm,owner,use FROM msrequip WHERE owner = #{OWNER}
